1.title: Between the sheets
1.plot: The doctors discover how obesity can ruins sex lives. From getting it on, to not getting it at all, there's no bedroom bother the doctors won't tackle. And what really turns women on - Sex or cake?

2.title: Layers of fat
2.plot: Dr christian meets a woman whose excessive eating has left a massive growth on her leg that weighs the same as a small child. Dr dawn and dr pixie visit glasgow, one of the world's fattest cities.

3.title: Toilet troubles
3.plot: The doctors examine how being overweight can impact on toilet habits, featuring digestive disorders caused by overeating such as heartburn, constipation and gallstones.

4.title: Over eaters
4.plot: The doctors meet patients with food phobias and calorie addictions, including one man who eats 6000 calories per day.

5.title: Back to the clinic
5.plot: Dr christian continues the story of patience, a woman whose excessive eating left her with a growth on her leg the weight of a small child.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: As the nation's waist size spirals out of control, the embarrassing bodies doctors help the seriously overweight cope with illnesses caused by obesity.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: The second programme meets a husband and wife couple with a combined weight of 52 stone, and a 21-year-old mum whose life is maligned by her enormous j cup breasts.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Dr pixie comes face to face with three huge hernias, and dr christian meets malissa jones, who made headlines in 2008, for being the world's first teenager to undergo a gastric band operation.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: The doctors deal with the impact obesity has on fertility, the largest man boobs dr pixie has ever seen, and excess hair caused by polycystic ovaries.

imdb.title: Embarrassing fat bodies
plot: As the nation's waist size spirals out of control, the embarrassing Bodies doctors help the seriously overweight cope with illnesses caused by obesity.
